p.style: font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.295; margin-bottom: 8pt; margin-top: 0pt; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Based upon new guidance, the meals that will be available to children in the GCLS district will now be by delivery only. No one will pick up meals from this point forward. If you need meals for your children, you must call The Education Connection at (740) 441-3052 by tomorrow, March 23, at noon. You will need to leave the following information on the message: Name of Child’s School, Parent or Guardian’s Name, Number of Children and Address for Delivery

p.style: font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 16px; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.295; margin-bottom: 8pt; margin-top: 0pt; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: This request will cover deliveries to be made this week on Tuesday afternoon (2 meals) and Friday afternoon (5 meals and snack pack). If you were on the delivery list last week, you do not need to call again. The drop off will be made to porches and no contact will be made with individuals.

div.h6: Stay up to date with all of the information about your district.

div.span: Updated 20-21 PRE Registration for Kindergarten. This PRE registration is for ALL children entering Gallia County Local Schools Kindergarten even if they were in our Preschool program the 19-20 school year. Please see the link below to pre-register for kindergarten. Previous Preschool students will NOT need to do an official ...
Pre-registration for Preschool 2020-2021. Please see the attached flyer and link for information on registering children for preschool.

Preschool Registration will be as follows for the 2020-2021 school year:
All times will be from 10:00 am to 6:00 pm

Southwestern - May 4th
Hannan Trace - May 11th
